alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 1:48AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to a few inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas and West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM early this morning to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
